Ingredients:
 4 Hard or Soft Taco Shells
 1 lb. Ground Beef
 1 Taco Seasoning Packet
 8 oz. Sour Cream
 16 oz. Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese
 2 cups Shredded Lettuce
 
 Optional Toppings:
 Guacamole
 Salsa
 Queso
 
 Substitutes For Ground Beef:
 Chicken
 Shrimp
 Turkey
 Tofu
 
 Instructions:
 1. Cook the ground beef over medium high
 heat until the meat is well browned, stirring
 often. Pour out any fat from the beef.
 2. Add taco seasoning based on package
 instructions or for desired taste.
 3. Evenly distribute the ground beef into the
 taco shells (if using soft tacos, warm if desired).
 4. Top the tacos with toppings of your choice.
 5. Enjoy!
